61.title: Somebody Sounds Butt Hurt

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

61.plot: Doctor What is dismayed to find that after putting two years of work into the Bad Goddess series, a new Ah My Goddess manga series has been greenlit and the fans are talking about it like Bad Goddess never existed.

62.title: Marller Gets a Spinoff: Like Clockwork Redux

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

62.plot: Kevin retroactively expands his Season Three episode Like Clockwork from an 8 min short into a full blown 1 hour musical that's a mashup of 1960s hippie films. 95% of the movie was improvised without the existence of a written screenplay.

63.title: Marller Gets a Spinoff: eX-Driver Will Follow

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

63.plot: Kevin retroactively makes the lost episode from Season Three where Marller and Welsper bump into eX-Driver's Lisa Sakakino, just as their Tardis is stolen and taken to an Egyptian Casino owned by the Dragon Eye.

1.title: The Intervention

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: When Keiichi's friends realize he lied and never consummated his marriage to Belldandy, they throw an intervention party that accidentally results in Belldandy giving Keiichi a night of sex so intense that he suffers a Heart Attack.

2.title: How is That Funny?

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: When Keiichi is hospitalized with less than thirty days to live, Urd, Skuld, and Mara Marller go to an anime convention in Detroit, Michigan to seek out Kosuke Fujishima for financial help with his operation bills.

3.title: The Humor and the Heartbreak

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: When Keiichi finally passes away, his soul is accidentally sent to Valhalla to live with the original Three Norns from the Viking era, who have some angry words with him about how Kosuke Fujishima misrepresented their image.

4.title: Doctor What

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Skuld gets a visit from a real time lord named Doctor What, who suspiciously looks like Charlie Day, and is secretly pretending to be a lame second rate impersonator on Public Access as his cover. She is not impressed.

5.title: The Rejected Sequel

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: When Skuld wishes that her Nekomi Gang friends can visit her in Heaven, Marller twists her wish around, wiping out Planet Earth in a Nuclear Holocaust, leading to Yggdrasil Central comically suffering from overpopulation problems.

6.title: The Bad Goddess Who Fell to Earth

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: Earth's Population and the Goddesses are re-situated on the futuristic world of Planet Belldandy, where Skuld decides to sell off her invention patents to finance her ironically insane vision for a family restaurant named Casa De La Skuld.

7.title: About Urd's Girlfriend

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: Urd is secretly wrestling with her feelings about coming out of the closet to her family as a lesbian. The comedy twist is her girlfriend is none other than Natsumi Tsujimoto from Kosuke Fujishima's You're Under Arrest.

8.title: Assault on Yggdrasil

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: Yggdrasil Central finds itself under attack by a cyber terrorist calling himself The Gremlin. Doctor What and Lind have one hour to find their way to the center of a deadly teleporter maze before he drops Yggdrasil out of the Sky.

9.title: Evangelion Must Die & The Girl Meets World Sequel

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

9.plot: In order to prove himself as a new full time Ah My Goddess cast member, the Goddesses demand Doctor What travel back in time to assassinate the creators of Evangelion so they can have a real produced Season Three.

10.title: What is the Meaning of All This?

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

10.plot: A Bonus Epilogue, where Writer/Director Kevin from the Other Dimension explains the bizarre metaphorical nature of his satire series Bad Goddess. Kevin thinks he's reached the end, unaware that it is merely the beginning.

11.title: Season Two: The Pilot & You Never Go Full Meta

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

11.plot: Kevin from the Other Dimension goes for 48 Hours without Sleep and writes two of the craziest stories you've ever read. The first one is about overcoming writer's block, and the second one muses on the metaphorical nature of God.

12.title: Let's Get a Pizza

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

12.plot: When Skuld uses her Space Doubler to make Doctor What's Tardis bigger on the inside, Doctor What repays the favor by taking the Goddesses out to eat at a Pizza Hut located in the Ralph Bakshi universe of Heavy Traffic.

13.title: Renaissance World & Identity Crisis

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

13.plot: When Doctor What takes Urd, Megumi, and Otaki to a disappointing Renaissance Fair, he tries to make up for it by taking them to a much more authentic one, leaving them fearing he may have time travelled them to the Middle Ages.

14.title: Love in an Elevator

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

14.plot: Doctor What regenerates into the likeness of Fright Night actor Stephen Geoffreys, meanwhile Sayoko Mishima overcomes homelessness by taking a job as an Elevator Girl and unknowingly falls in love with a Terrorist called Mr Grin.

15.title: Sorority Bad Goddesses at the Slime Bowl-a-Rama

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

15.plot: The Goddesses try to help the new Doctor What face his fears by tricking him into hosting Skuld's birthday party at a bowling alley located in the universe of Fright Night Part Two. The Vampire Cast of The Lost Boys cameo.

16.title: Oh Brother

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

16.plot: Doctor What falls into a midlife crisis when the Nekomi Gang pranks him by demanding he take them on frivolous adventures to places like the Bank, and the local Supermarket. Does nobody care about the wonder of Adventure anymore?

17.title: The Joy of Love Hate Lovin'

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

17.plot: The Goddesses hold a competition to see who can seduce Doctor What into bed with them to determine whether his regeneration into Stephen Geoffreys also made him gay. The winner will be crowned Empress of the North Pole.

18.title: Bad Goddess Fan Club

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

18.plot: Fearing that Bad Goddess may be cancelled soon due to low ratings, Keiichi puts Mara Marller in charge of the Bad Goddess Fan Club where she sends response letters to real people who never wrote her in the first place and Roasts Them.

19.title: The Keys of Marinus Serial

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

19.plot: Kevin from the Other Dimension is held hostage and forced to write a seven part serial at gunpoint. The plot revolves are Doctor What, Urd, Natsumi, and Otaki planet hopping to find the lost officers from You're Under Arrest.

20.title: Hot Off The Press & Where Did All the Aliens Go?

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

20.plot: Troma Films Lloyd Kaufman cameos as The First Doctor What and finds himself battling The Grammar Nazi with Belldandy and Otaki, who has come to punish Bad Goddess for it's notorious spelling errors in the subtitles.

21.title: A Letter From Kodansha: Bad Goddess Fan Club Part 2

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

21.plot: When Kodansha Ltd's Lawyers legally threaten Kevin from the Other Dimension to Cease and Desist, Marller and Welsper fight back with a Roast explaining just because Kodansha didn't watch it doesn't mean the fans agree with them.

22.title: Marller Gets a Spinoff: The Private Sector

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

22.plot: When Kevin from the Other Dimension is scandalized off of Public Access, he vents his rage by doing a spinoff where Mara Marller finds herself kidnapped by Doctor What and Sayoko Mishima just as she was promoted to a CEO position.

23.title: The Dragon Eye Serial: The Flying Shoes

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

23.plot: The Marller Gang find themselves stranded in the Dark Ages, where they come into conflict with Welsper, attempting to trick a child into walking a ledge around a castle wall. Luckily, Doctor What has Skuld's Flying Shoes.

24.title: The Dragon Eye Serial: Dark of the Windmill

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

24.plot: The Marller Gang continue their medieval journey, taking refuge in a creepy abandoned windmill - or is it? We proudly introduce to you, Mr Nilbog.

25.title: The Dragon Eye Serial: A Ghostly Village Story

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

25.plot: The Marller Gang stumble across a medieval peasant hunt village where Richard O'Brien and Warwick Davis tell the story of a rogue knight named Keiichi the Spineless, which is a sex comedy parody of Hoichi the Earless from Kwaidan.

26.title: The Dragon Eye Serial: Sayoko at the Goblin Feast

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

26.plot: Having been abandoned by Marller, and imprisoned by Richard O'Brien and Warwick Davis, Doctor What and Sayoko try to escape from a dungeon before Sayoko is carried off and sacrificed to the Goblins for a yearly ritual feast.

27.title: The Dragon Eye Serial: Those Who Hunt Elves

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

27.plot: Sayoko is saved at the last minute by Those Who Hunt Elves - wait a minute? What are they doing in this series? And more than that, why does the plot of their kids show feel like it condones a form of sexual assault?

28.title: The Dragon Eye Serial: When All Hope Seems Lost

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

28.plot: The Marller Gang band together to battle a medieval warlock calling himself The Dragon Eye. But just when they think they've won, Thirteen Demons are released through the Tardis into the Alternate Universes. Uh Oh.

29.title: Marller Gets a Spinoff: Like Clockwork

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

29.plot: The Marller Gang find themselves stranded in the musical world of Milos Forman's Hair, and decide they have a responsibility to hunt down and capture the Escaped Thirteen Demons who are plotting a revolt against the Daimenkaicho.

30.title: Marller Gets a Spinoff: The Hellsing Peccadillo

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

30.plot: When the Marller Gang accidentally mistakes Alucard, from Hellsing, for one of the Thirteen Escaped Demons, their attempt to trap him accidentally let's him loose into the Ah My Goddess universe. Oops.

31.title: Marller Gets a Spinoff: Before the Firefight

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

31.plot: Marller and Welsper, having been separated from Doctor What and the others via the Runaway Tardis, go searching for the Escaped Thirteen Demons on their own. Their first stop is Ghost in the Shell and Najica Blitz Tactics.

32.title: Marller Gets a Spinoff: The Kronos High School Blues

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

32.plot: Skuld is taken away to the universe of Bio Booster Armour Guyver for safety reasons concerning the Doublet System. She discovers Sho Fukamachi is still bullied despite his superhero status. Marller and Welsper arrive to taunt him.

33.title: The Bad Goddess Anniversary Special

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

33.plot: After witnessing Kosuke Fujishima being scandalized for his marriage a second time, Kevin creates a similar parody situation between Belldandy, Keiichi, and Peorth pleading to the internet community not to pass judgment on him.

34.title: Marller Gets a Spinoff: That One Regret

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

34.plot: Marller and Welsper find themselves in the OMG Manga storyline where Marller turned Sayoko into the Queen of Hearts. This was a pivotal turning point in Marller's life. The one time she almost won. And now is her second chance.

35.title: Marller Gets a Spinoff: Blame It on Brodsky

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

35.plot: Mara Marller, having been stripped of her license status, and forced to live as a human, convinces the Marller Gang to take up day jobs as anime voice actors using the names Alyssa Brodsky, Karen Neil, and Matt Caplan as pseudonyms.

36.title: The Moral Dilemma

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

36.plot: When Kevin from the Other Dimension witnesses a girl he met crying out for help over the internet over a sexual assault allegation against a comedy club, he vents his emotions into a Doctor What think-piece that angers all of his friends.

37.title: Court Testimony Video plus The Moral Dilemma

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

37.plot: Kevin tries to plea his case on the sexual assault victim's behalf to the police on why they should look into this when she won't come forward. It's because she said that she thought other victims were involved.

38.title: You're Under Arrest: Path of the Raven - The First Testimony Confrontation

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

38.plot: Kevin gets into a confrontation with a friend on facebook over the testimony video and realizes she is a lead towards getting information to the sex crimes division. He turns their argument dialogue into a You're Under Arrest cartoon.

39.title: You're Under Arrest: Path of the Raven: The Purple Folder Saga

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

39.plot: "Officer Ken" tries to meet up with "Natsumi" in hopes of getting her to answer his questions at Saul Ravencraft's Vault of Horror, only to have his plans ruined when a Slanderous Prank Phone Call get's Saul's show cancelled.

40.title: You're Under Arrest: Path of the Raven: Mind Games with Tsujimoto

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

40.plot: "Officer Ken" suddenly realizes the tragic irony when he hears "Natsumi" herself is being slandered with false allegations by a jealous ex-friend because she was given control over the Bokuto Police Dept's facebook page.

41.title: She Liked It Spooky: A Celebration of Ebony Strange at the Elysium

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

41.plot: Kevin from the Other Dimension attempts to shoot a stakeout film with ZLTV's Brenda Dickerson at the Elysium in hopes of catching the slanderer in the act for the police. It takes place at a bisexual Drag/Burlesque show.

42.title: You're Under Arrest: Path of the Raven: One Night at the Elysium

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

42.plot: A confrontation happens at the end of the night at the Elysium resulting in the slanderer being kicked out. "Officer Ken" fails to get it on camera, but uses the layout in his video to detail the night events to the police.

43.title: Bad Goddess Theater presents: The Children's Hour

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

43.plot: In response to the slander attack from the Path of the Raven series, Kevin from the Other Dimension does an Ah My Goddess remake of Lillian Hellman's The Children's Hour to send out a message.

44.title: Date Night

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

44.plot: When Peorth and Keiichi go out on a date to see Ken Russell's Crimes of Passion, Skuld calls in a false tip to the You're Under Arrest officers that a theater pirate is going to attempt to camcord the movie.

45.title: You're Under Arrest: A Few Bad Apples

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

45.plot: Natsumi Tsujimoto tries to enlist the help of Doctor What to travel back in time and stop a cop killer before he can commit the murders. There's just one problem. All of the fallen officers were investigated for corruption.

46.title: Bubblegum Shortage

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

46.plot: Doctor What, Natsumi, and Urd return home after the events of A Few Bad Apples only to find that fractured timeline has caused the Ah My Goddess universe to be replaced by Bubblegum Crisis and Ex-Driver.

47.title: Love Bites

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

47.plot: Karma bites Kevin from the Other Dimension in the ass when, after mocking Fujishima's marital problems, Kevin's own marriage begins to fall apart as he uses Belldandy and Keiichi to explain the situation to his daughter.

48.title: Invoking the Norns

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

48.plot: Feelings that his life problems are happening because the norns were offended and tried to curse him, Kevin from the Other Dimension tries to invoke the real Belldandy, Urd and Skuld to make amends.

49.title: The Role Play Experiment

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

49.plot: Kevin from the Other Dimension discovers some Ah My Goddess Role Play accounts on twitter and approaches Mara Marller's account as Doctor What to see how she might really react to meeting him in real life.

50.title: Marller Gets a Spinoff S2: Marller Finds Jesus

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

50.plot: The Marller Gang travels back to biblical times, where Marller accidentally bumps into Jesus Christ, whom she previously thought didn't exist. Her attempts to tell her friends fall flat on her face as nobody believes her.

51.title: Marller Gets a Spinoff S2: Beware the Self Righteous

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

51.plot: The Marller Gang witnesses a Racist Mormon Internet Troll bragging online about how he called ICE Immigration on a member from his own Church. Marller logically explains why what he is doing is a form of Swatting/Stalking.

52.title: Marller Gets a Spinoff S2: Let's Troll Angel Tales

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

52.plot: Mara Marller and Welsper comically troll the cast of Angel Tales by pointing out that it's about a Serial Pet Killer being reward with sex by Angelic Re-incarnations of his Dead Housepets.

53.title: Marller Gets a Spinoff S2: A Certain Magical Pimpdex

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

53.plot: The Marller Gang takes a vacation to Academy City only to discover the cast of A Certain Magical Index have been brainwashed by Mad Doctor Eddie Griffin into running a prostitution ring with the Misaka Clone Sisters.

54.title: The Mad Doctor Serial: H is for Hurry!

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

54.plot: The Mad Doctor is revealed to be One of the Thirteen Escaped Demons and splits up the Marller Gang and Index characters into a time portal experiment called The Gauntlet. Doctor What is regenerated as director Spike Lee.

55.title: The Mad Doctor Serial: The Lost Soul

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

55.plot: The Certain Magical Pimpdex Gang recites a poem in memory of Kevin from the Other Dimension's father, who passed away during the making of these episodes.

56.title: The Mad Doctor Serial: Tardis 54, Where Are You?

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

56.plot: The Marller Gang has to find the lost cast members from Do The Right Thing so they can battle The Blue Meanies in Bed-Stuy and save the Funimation universe. A collection of leftover scenes from the unfinished serial.

57.title: Danny, My Boy!

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

57.plot: Kevin from the Other Dimension details all of the strange serendipity incidents that have plagued him the whole Bad Goddess series, and how he may have brought a spiritual curse down upon himself that took his father's life.

58.title: You're Under Arrest: Pandora's Box

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

58.plot: Natsumi and Urd discuss a conspiracy theory over the death of Kevin from the Other Dimension's father and how Kodansha may have benefitted from it. Skuld invokes the Norns and puts a curse on Fujishima and Kodansha Ltd's legal staff.

59.title: Marller Gets a Spinoff S2: Marller's Good Fortune

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

59.plot: Mara Marller performs an experiment in video witchcraft as she recreates the Good Fortune spell that Kevin believes may have accidentally brought the Monkey's Paw kind of Good Fortune down on his head.

60.title: You're Under Arrest: APD Policy Manual

episode of.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic (TV Series 2017– )

60.plot: Kevin from the Other Dimension adapts the first twenty five pages of the Austin Police Department's Policy Manual as a 45 minute test pilot for a Public Service Video not unlike the ones they force you to watch in Defensive Driving Class.

imdb.plot outline: When Planet Earth is destroyed in a Nuclear Holocaust, the Goddesses and the Nekomi Gang are forced to relocate to the futuristic world of Planet Belldandy, where they find themselves battling a terrorist group called The Individual Me's alongside Everybody's Favorite Public Access Time Lord, Doctor What.
imdb.title: Ah! My Goddess: Bad Goddess The Anime Video Comic
plot: When Planet Earth is destroyed in a Nuclear Holocaust, the Goddesses and the Nekomi Gang are forced to relocate to the futuristic world of Planet Belldandy, where they find themselves battling a terrorist group called The Individual Me's alongside Everybody's Favorite Public Access Time Lord, Doctor What.::Kevin from the Other Dimension
